Bayesian regressions to calibrate the clumped isotopes paleothermometer using stan.

Source: R/cal.ion.bayesian.R
cal.ion.bayesian.Rd

Bayesian regressions to calibrate the clumped isotopes paleothermometer using stan.

Usage

cal.ion.bayesian(calibrationData, numSavedSteps = 3000, MC = TRUE)

Arguments

calibrationData

The target calibration dataset.

numSavedSteps

Number of MCMC iterations to save.

MC

Multicore (TRUE/FALSE)
